titleStmt.title: Death and the grave, without either sting or victory, or, A Few lines not without reason shewing to the world something of the worth of that able and humble minister of the gospel Mr. Christopher Fowler, who departed this life upon the 15[th] of January, 1676/7 [i.e. 1677] / by one who was brought to hear him through lying reports.
titleStmt.author: One who was brought to hear him through lying reports.
